name: Mucca Company
overview:
We build services that help shoppers shop and sellers sell.

MuccaShop is a single place in wich consumers can find anything from the web. We connect shoppers with over 1 million products from tens of thousands of retailers with its unique portfolio of engaging and informative websites.

Based in Brazil and working locally, MuccaShop was born in 2010 with a simple catalog of products and ever since, we have been developing the tool in order to provide the best shopping experience.

Oferta do Dia, which is portuguese for Daily Offer, is a group discount plataform developed within MuccaShop and uses the sinergy of its partnerships to deliver daily the best offer to the users.

SÃ³ Desconto is also a plataform within MuccaShop that agregates products with discounts and coupons stores.

The most recent service developed by the group is Orelha de Livro, which is a social networks for book lovers. In Orelha de Livro the users can list all books they have read, r they are reading, or they would like to read. They can also follow friends and share interests.
